thread.title: SeniorWell Expands Leadership Team with Executive Hire

author: cnbc.com
title: SeniorWell Expands Leadership Team with Executive Hire
text:
Executive will expand the company’s footprint and optimize patient experience
CHICAGO--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- SeniorWell, a mobile healthcare company delivering on-site podiatry, optometry, dentistry, and audiology services to seniors residing in long-term nursing facilities across the Midwest, today announced the hiring of John Moroney as Chief Executive Officer.
Moroney will oversee the day-to-day operations of SeniorWell with a focus on strengthening its clinical services and enhancing the patient experience in all homes serviced. He will be laser-focused on expanding the reach of SeniorWell to new markets and will drive significant business growth through multi-faceted initiatives. Moroney brings to SeniorWell extensive expertise in process implementation, strategic development, and project management within the healthcare and hospitality industries.
“John Moroney is a proven leader in the healthcare space who has strong industry experience and a long track record of driving results,” said Kenneth King, Director of SeniorWell. “We are confident that he will build on SeniorWell’s successes and drive substantial business improvements that will launch SeniorWell into its next phase of development.”
About SeniorWell
SeniorWell is a mobile healthcare company delivering on-site podiatry, optometry, dentistry, and audiology services to seniors residing in long-term nursing facilities. Through its relationships with nursing facilities across the Midwest, SeniorWell sees a significant amount of patients per year. In addition to providing on-site care, SeniorWell also manufactures and fabricates custom hearing aids, dentures, and eyeglasses for patients in need. For more information about SeniorWell and how it improves quality of life for seniors, visit http://www.SeniorWellGroup.com .
